body.p:
Falmouth Ky May 3d 1864
Govr Bramlett.
Dear Sir:

Charles Barton having resigned his office as justice of the peace in Pendleton County, we recommend ^J. O. Thomasson^ as a suitable person to be commissioned a justice in his room. He is a loyal citizen, and is suitable for the office.

C T Barton
Jno E Records
Saml. F. Swoops
H. N. Newman
Resignation accepted and commision ordered for the person recommended

Tho E Bramlette
Resig & apptd
4th May/64
